ns0:entry.ns0:title: Dolibarr/dolibarr
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr
Language: php
Dolibarr ERP CRM is a modern software package to manage your company or foundation's activity (contacts, suppliers, invoices, orders, stocks, agenda, accounting, ...). it's an open source Web application (written in PHP) designed for businesses of any sizes, foundations and freelancers.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HashenUdara/edoc-doctor-appointment-system
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HashenUdara/edoc-doctor-appointment-system
Language: php
This PHP-based open source project is a web application for booking medical appointments. Patients can use the platform to easily schedule appointments with their doctors, saving time and effort. The project's source code is open for anyone to use, modify, and distribute according to their needs.

Open-source event management and ticket selling platform — perfect for concerts, conferences, and everything in between 🎟️ If you find this project helpful, please consider giving us a star ⭐️

ns0:entry.ns0:title: danielmiessler/SecLists
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/danielmiessler/SecLists
Language: php
SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

Drush is a command-line shell and scripting interface for Drupal, a veritable Swiss Army knife designed to make life easier for those who spend their working hours hacking away at the command prompt.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: pterodactyl/panel
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel
Language: php
Pterodactyl® is a free, open-source game server management panel built with PHP, React, and Go. Designed with security in mind, Pterodactyl runs all game servers in isolated Docker containers while exposing a beautiful and intuitive UI to end users.
